record.field: Template / Month-End Close
Finance SSC Month-End Close workflow template. Contains all recurring close activities organized by category: Initial & Compliance, Accruals & Amortization, WIP Reconciliation, and Final Adjustments.
employees
I.1 - Process Payroll, Final Pay, SL Conversions, Early Retirement Accrual

Process and record Payroll, Final Pay, SL Conversions, and early retirement accrual.
Category: Payroll Processing & Tax Provision
Workflow: - Preparation: RIM (Day -6) - Review: RIM/SFM (Day -3) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day -3)
foundation_corp
I.2 - Calculate Tax Provision and PPB Provision

Calculate and record the monthly Tax Provision and PPB Provision (performance bonuses).
Category: Payroll Processing & Tax Provision
Workflow: - Preparation: RIM (Day -3) - Review: RIM/SFM (Day -2) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day -2)
foundation_corp
I.3 - Compile Monthly VAT Report (Initial and Additional Entries)

Compile, review, and record the monthly VAT Report (Initial and additional entries).
Category: VAT Data/Filing
Workflow: - Preparation: JAP (Day -3) - Review: JPAL (Day -2) - Approval: RIM/SFM (Day -2)
vat_tax
I.4 - Compile Monthly Input VAT Entries

Compile and record monthly Input VAT entries (VAT paid on purchases) and the monthly VAT Report (cumulative summary of VAT activity).
Category: VAT Data/Filing
Workflow: - Preparation: JLI (Day -3) - Review: JPAL (Day -2) - Approval: RIM/SFM (Day -2)
vat_tax
I.5 - Process CA Liquidations (Project-Related)

Process and record Cash Advance (CA) Liquidations for specific project-related expenses.
Category: CA Liquidations (All)
Workflow: - Preparation: LAS (Day -3) - Review: RIM/SFM (Day -2) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day -1)
working_capital
I.6 - Process CA Liquidations (Employee Submitted)

Process and record Cash Advance (CA) Liquidations submitted by employees.
Category: CA Liquidations (All)
Workflow: - Preparation: RMQB (Day -3) - Review: RIM/SFM (Day -2) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day -1)
working_capital
II.1 - Record Accruals for Consultancy Fees and General Expenses

Record accruals for Consultancy Fees and various routine General Expense Accruals. Estimated expense for which a vendor invoice has not yet been received.
Category: Accruals (Revenue/Fees)
Workflow: - Preparation: RIM (Day -2) - Review: CKVC/FD (Day -2) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day -2)
foundation_corp
II.2 - Accrue Management/Royalty Fees and Innovation Funds

Accrue monthly expenses for Management and Royalty fees, consulting fees, and funds for Innovations/Initiatives. Brief Detail: Recognizing an expense for internal projects or strategic corporate investments not yet formally invoiced.
Category: Accruals (Revenue/Fees)
Workflow: - Preparation: BOM (Day -3) - Review: RIM (Day -2) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day -2)
foundation_corp
II.3 - Recognize Revenue and Billable Costs

Recognizing revenue and billable costs based on client contracts and project status. Accrue estimated Production, Retainer Fees, Media Commission, Creative Fees, and OOPC. Recording estimated Out-of-Pocket Costs that will eventually be billed to a client.
Category: Accruals (Revenue/Fees)
Workflow: - Preparation: JPAL (Day -3) - Review: BOM (Day -2) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day -1)
revenue_wip
II.4 - Record Recurring Monthly Costs (Non-Fixed Assets)

Recording estimated expenses for recurring monthly costs and recognizing non-fixed asset costs. Accrue recurring Expenses (estimated expense for regularly occurring services).
Category: Accruals (Revenue/Fees)
Workflow: - Preparation: LAS (Day -2) - Review: RIM (Day -1) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day -1)
foundation_corp
II.5 - Record Other Computer Related Costs

Record the monthly recognition/capitalization of Other Computer Related Costs.
Category: Accruals (Revenue/Fees)
Workflow: - Preparation: LAS (Day -2) - Review: RIM (Day -1) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day -1)
foundation_corp
II.6 - Accrue Employee Cellphone Allowance

Accrue monthly expense for Employee Cellphone Allowance.
Category: Accruals (Revenue/Fees)
Workflow: - Preparation: RMQB (Day -3) - Review: RIM (Day -2) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day -2)
foundation_corp
II.7 - Compile Documents for Revenue Accruals

Compile documents for the attachment of the revenue accruals.
Category: Accruals (Revenue/Fees)
Workflow: - Preparation: JRMO (Day -1)
revenue_wip
II.8 - Record Rental Income/Expense and Hospitalization Amortization

Record recurring monthly Rental Income/Expense and monthly amortization expense for employee hospitalization plans.
Category: Amortizations (IT/Fixed Assets)
Workflow: - Preparation: RIM (Day -2) - Review: RIM (Day -1) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day -1)
foundation_corp
II.9 - Allocate Prepaid Expenses, Depreciation, Amortization

Allocating prepaid expenses and capital costs over time to reflect true monthly resource consumption. Record monthly Depreciation, Amortization for vehicles/purchases/LOA, and Amortization for all technology licenses and shared service costs.
Category: Amortizations (IT/Fixed Assets)
Workflow: - Preparation: BOM (Day -2) - Review: RIM (Day -1) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day -1)
foundation_corp
II.10 - Record Corporate Insurance Premiums

Monthly tracking and recording of premiums for various corporate insurance policies. Record monthly accrual for various Corporate Insurance types and amortize prepaid Health Insurance.
Category: Amortizations (IT/Fixed Assets)
Workflow: - Preparation: BOM (Day -1) - Review: RIM (Day 0) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day 0)
foundation_corp
II.11 - Amortize Business Permit and LOA

Allocating prepaid expenses and capital costs over time to reflect true monthly resource consumption. Record monthly Amortization of the Business Permit and Amortization of LOA.
Category: Amortizations (IT/Fixed Assets)
Workflow: - Preparation: JPAL (Day -2) - Review: BOM (Day -1) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day -1)
foundation_corp
II.12 - Accrue Estimated Monthly Audit Fees

Accrue estimated monthly Audit Fees.
Category: Amortizations (IT/Fixed Assets)
Workflow: - Preparation: JPAL (Day -2) - Review: BOM (Day -1) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day -1)
foundation_corp
II.13 - Record Intercompany Rental Expense/Income

Record monthly Rental Expense/Income related to intercompany transactions.
Category: Amortizations (IT/Fixed Assets)
Workflow: - Preparation: JPAL (Day -2) - Review: BOM (Day -1) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day -1)
foundation_corp
II.14 - Revalue Intercompany Balances

Perform month-end Revaluation of Intercompany Balances. Adjusting intercompany balances to reflect the correct value at the month-end exchange rate.
Category: Amortizations (IT/Fixed Assets)
Workflow: - Preparation: RIM (Day -2) - Review: BOM (Day -1) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day -1)
foundation_corp
II.15 - Record Financed Assets and Long-Term Commitments

Recording transactions for financed assets and long-term commitments. Record monthly interest expense on leased assets and process amortization/reclassifications for prepaid corporate fees.
Category: Amortizations (IT/Fixed Assets)
Workflow: - Preparation: LAS (Day -1) - Review: RIM (Day 0) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day 0)
foundation_corp
III.1 - Reconcile and Reclassify WIP/OOP Costs

Reconciling and reclassifying costs to ensure they are correctly categorized as billable (WIP) or internal (OOP). Perform month-end Reclassifications of OOP to WIP (moves client-related expenses to an active project account) and necessary Reclass WIP to OOP (moves costs back if non-billable).
Category: WIP/OOP Reconciliation
Workflow: - Preparation: JPAL (Day -1) - Review: RIM (Day 0) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day 0)
revenue_wip
III.2 - Prepare WIP Schedule Summary per Job#

Prepare WIP schedule summary per Job#.
Category: WIP/OOP Reconciliation
Workflow: - Preparation: JRMO (Day -2) - Review: JPAL (Day -1) - Approval: BOM (Day -1)
revenue_wip
IV.1 - Reverse/Adjust Temporary Journal Entries

The necessary reversal or adjustment of temporary journal entries created in a previous month. Process reversal entries for the prior month's accruals and reclassifications.
Category: Final Adjustments & Close
Workflow: - Preparation: RIM (Day -1) - Review: RIM (Day 0) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day 0)
administrative
IV.2 - Reverse Prior Month Accruals

Process reversal entries for all prior month Accruals (e.g., trainings, production/retainers).
Category: Final Adjustments & Close
Workflow: - Preparation: BOM (Day -1) - Review: RIM (Day 0) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day 0)
administrative
IV.3 - Prepare Flash, Wins & Losses, Revenue Reports

Prepare reports for Flash, Wins & Losses and Revenue.
Category: Final Adjustments & Close
Workflow: - Preparation: BOM (Day 0) - Review: RIM/SFM (Day +3) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day +3)
administrative
IV.4 - Prepare Working Capital Report (AR)

Prepare reports for Working Capital related to AR.
Category: Final Adjustments & Close
Workflow: - Preparation: JPAL (Day 0) - Review: BOM (Day +3) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day +3)
working_capital
IV.5 - Prepare AP Aging Report (Working Capital)

Prepare AP Aging report for working capital submission.
Category: Final Adjustments & Close
Workflow: - Preparation: LAS (Day 0) - Review: RIM (Day +3) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day +3)
working_capital
IV.6 - Prepare HOW's Summary Report

Prepare HOW's summary report.
Category: Final Adjustments & Close
Workflow: - Preparation: LAS (Day -1) - Review: RIM (Day 0) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day 0)
administrative
IV.7 - Correct GL Entries and Reclassifications

Correcting entries across the general ledger (GL). Process required reclassifications between specific GL accounts and between Marketing Expense categories.
Category: Final Adjustments & Close
Workflow: - Preparation: LAS (Day 0) - Review: RIM (Day 0) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day 0)
administrative
IV.8 - Prepare AP Aging Report (Detailed per Invoice)

Prepare AP Aging report with detailed status per invoice.
Category: Final Adjustments & Close
Workflow: - Preparation: JLI (Day -1) - Review: LAS (Day 0) - Approval: RIM (Day 0)
working_capital
IV.9 - Reclassify Expense Accounts

Adjusting a recorded expense from one GL account to another to ensure correct reporting. Process reclassifications to correct expense categories (e.g., General Expense to Wireless and Meals).
Category: Final Adjustments & Close
Workflow: - Preparation: RMQB (Day 0) - Review: RIM (Day 0) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day 0)
administrative
IV.10 - Transfer Costs Between Project Codes

Adjusting costs or revenues between different internal project codes or job numbers. Process and record Transfers of Job Codes for consultancy fees and corporate projects.
Category: Final Adjustments & Close
Workflow: - Preparation: JAP (Day 0) - Review: JPAL (Day 0) - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day 0)
administrative
IV.11 - Final TB Review

Final Trial Balance Review by Senior Finance Manager.
Category: Final Adjustments & Close
Workflow: - Review: RIM/SFM (Day 0)
administrative
IV.12 - Final TB Sign-off & Filing

Final Trial Balance Sign-off and Filing by Finance Director.
Category: Final Adjustments & Close
Workflow: - Approval: CKVC/FD (Day 0)
administrative
